## Power series

Having discussed sequences and series of numbers, we will take a conceptual jump to the discussion of sequences and series of functions. However, we will only have a tase. This is power series. There are other common series of functions that we will not explore in this course

## Units covered in this course

* Test for Divergence
* Integral Test
* Comparison Tests
* Ratio and Root Tests
